name: Heart Disease Prediction
desc: Logistic regression model in interactive web application predicts heart disease presence using user input and Streamlit.

name: Health Insurance Price Prediction
desc: This repo houses a health insurance cost prediction model using machine learning. It offers estimates via a user-friendly Streamlit web app.

name: Iris Classification
desc: This repository features a Logistic Regression-based Iris data classification model trained on the well-known Iris dataset, encompassing flower measurements and species.

name: IntelliBot (Chatbot)
desc: Intellibot is an AI-powered chatbot developed using Python, trained on English language data from various fields.

name: QR Code Generator
desc: QR Code Generator with Tkinter is a Python project that allows you to generate QR codes from input links and display them on the screen.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal Portfolio Website. Don't Need Much Info About It, Just Scroll Down. You're Here Only!

name: WeatherApp
desc: A simple weather website that displays the current weather of the location searched. It uses Ninja-API for fetching data.

name: Netflix Landing Page Clone
desc: This is the core code from scratch to clone the landing page of Netflix using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

name: Temperature Converter
desc: The Temperature Conversion Tool simplifies temperature conversion between Celsius and Fahrenheit scales, offering a user-friendly and efficient solution.

name: Movie Ticket Booking System
desc: The primary objective of the system is to allows users to browse movie listings, select a showtime and choose their seats for their tickets online.
